text: "Murder on My Mind" (censored as "Mischief on My Mind") is the lead single by American rapper YNW Melly. The song is from his debut mixtape I Am You. The song was originally uploaded onto SoundCloud on March 4, 2017, and later released as a single by 300 Entertainment on June 1, 2018. "Murder on My Mind" is considered YNW Melly's breakout hit, and garnered even further attention after the rapper turned himself in for double murder charges on February 13, 2019. ==Background== YNW Melly first thought up the chorus of "Murder on My Mind" when he was first incarcerated at the age of 16. The song is not written as a confession of his alleged double murder, as the song was released in March of 2017, while the alleged murders occurred in October of 2018. == Commercial performance == After news broke of YNW Melly's murder charges on February 13, 2019, "Murder on My Mind" garnered major public interest. Days later, the song reached number one on the US Apple Music chart. On national charts, it peaked inside the top 20 in the US, the UK and New Zealand as well as reaching the top 10 in both Canada and Belgium. == Music video == A music video for "Murder on My Mind", directed by Gabriel Hart, was released on August 3, 2018. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australia (ARIA) | 57 |- |- ! scope="row"| Canada (Canadian Hot 100) | 9 |- ! scope="row"| Ireland (IRMA) | 24 |- |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) | 18 |- ! scope="row"| Norway (VG-lista) | 30 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Billboard Hot 100 | 14 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 7 |- ! scope="row"| US Rolling Stone Top 100 | 86 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Canada (Canadian Hot 100) | 57 |- ! scope="row"| Portugal (AFP) | 200 |- ! scope="row"| US Billboard Hot 100 | 66 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 30 |- ! scope="row"| US Rolling Stone Top 100 | 25 |} ==Certifications== ==Mind on My Murder== A sequel to the song, "Mind on My Murder", was included on YNW Melly's debut mixtape I Am You and is written from the murder victim's perspective. ==References== Category:2017 songs Category:YNW Melly songs Category:2018 singles
